article_metadata.news_keywords: labor unions, sodexo, vermont fair food campaign, vermont, vermont news, vermont events, vermont press releases

og.description: UVM students, faculty/staff, community groups, labor unions, and Burlington residents are angry about Sodexo’s exploitative practices toward its workers, and have joined together with the Vermont Fair Food Campaign and Students Stand Up! to address this unacceptable conduct.
